aging: 24 months in oak barrels
vintage_description: Cool, elegant vintage with spring rains and breezy summer, enhancing vibrant acidity
visual_notes: Transparent ruby red, garnet reflections
olfactory_notes: Dried rose, raspberry, sweet spices, light smokiness
gustatory_notes: Elegant, polished tannins, fresh citrusy finish

aging: 24 months in Slavonian oak
vintage_description: Balanced vintage with warm days and cool nights, ideal for Nebbiolo's aromatic complexity
visual_notes: Luminous garnet with orange rim
olfactory_notes: Rose petal, wild cherry, licorice, crushed mint
gustatory_notes: Structured yet refined, firm tannins, vibrant acidity, saline finish

aging: 36 months in new French oak barriques followed by 24 months in bottle
vintage_description: Exceptional vintage with optimal ripening conditions and perfect harvest timing allowing for concentrated fruit with balanced acidity and structure
visual_notes: Deep impenetrable garnet-black with purple highlights and remarkable viscosity with pronounced legs
olfactory_notes: Extraordinarily complex nose of blackberry jam, dark chocolate, black cherry liqueur, tobacco, espresso, cloves, leather, and balsamic notes with hints of dried figs and licorice
gustatory_notes: Massively structured palate with exceptional concentration, velvety yet powerful tannins, remarkable balance despite high alcohol, multilayered dark fruit flavors with notes of chocolate, spice, and a nearly endless finish

aging: 4 months in stainless steel tanks
vintage_description: Favorable vintage with moderate temperatures and sufficient rainfall producing wines with bright acidity and expressive aromatics
visual_notes: Pale straw yellow with green reflections, brilliant clarity and moderate viscosity
olfactory_notes: Fresh and vibrant bouquet of green apple, citrus peel, white peach, jasmine flowers, with delicate hints of Mediterranean herbs and saline mineral notes
gustatory_notes: Crisp and refreshing palate with pronounced acidity, medium body, clean citrus and stone fruit flavors, notable minerality, and a pleasantly persistent finish with almond nuances

aging: 6 months in American oak barrels followed by 3 months in bottle
vintage_description: Excellent vintage characterized by hot summer days and cool nights yielding perfectly ripened grapes with balanced sugar levels and phenolic maturity
food_pairings: hearty pasta dishes with meat sauce
visual_notes: Deep ruby red with purple highlights and significant viscosity displaying pronounced legs
olfactory_notes: Rich aromatic profile of ripe black cherries, blackberry jam, plum preserves, vanilla, cinnamon, and chocolate with undertones of Mediterranean herbs and sweet tobacco
gustatory_notes: Full-bodied and velvety with well-integrated alcohol, moderate tannins, balanced acidity, concentrated dark fruit flavors, pleasant spice notes, and a warm, lingering finish with hints of licorice

gustatory_notes: Crisp and refreshing palate with pronounced acidity, medium body, clean citrus and stone fruit flavors, notable minerality, and a pleasantly persistent finish with almond nuances
